channel.title: Comments on: This guy took a photo every time…

item.title: By: Michele Mizejewski
item.dc:creator: Michele Mizejewski
item.description: Yes, some of the faces are priceless.
item.content:encoded: Yes, some of the faces are priceless.

item.title: By: Julia Kochi
item.dc:creator: Julia Kochi
item.description:
So interesting. I've gotten into some interesting conversations with strangers when I was reading a book but never when I'm reading my Kindle. It's too intrusive to ask "what are you reading?" but okay to comment if the title is visible.
And I love the look on the guy's face who's reading The Elements of Style. That's how I'd feel!
item.content:encoded:
So interesting. I’ve gotten into some interesting conversations with strangers when I was reading a book but never when I’m reading my Kindle. It’s too intrusive to ask “what are you reading?” but okay to comment if the title is visible.

And I love the look on the guy’s face who’s reading The Elements of Style. That’s how I’d feel!

item.title: By: Kemi Amin
item.dc:creator: Kemi Amin
item.description:
Thanks Anneliese. Read about this a couple of weeks ago here: http://laughingsquid.com/photographer-documents-book-reading-commuters-on-the-new-york-city-subway-in-the-last-book-project/
Great photo series.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Anneliese. Read about this a couple of weeks ago here: http://laughingsquid.com/photographer-documents-book-reading-commuters-on-the-new-york-city-subway-in-the-last-book-project/

Great photo series.
